Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Andrew
Message: What makes you feel so great?

Author: Andrew
Message: Damn that's cool. I wish I could say the same.

Author: Andrew
Message: Like air, I guess. I don't really know.

Author: Andrew
Message: I can see that, but I mean, after that.

Author: aaaa
Message: What do you mean after that?

Author: Andrew
Message: You're not going to be talking to me all day right? Any plans for what you'll be doing later?

Author: Andrew
Message: Same as me then. I'll probably just watch Netflix or something like that later.

Author: Andrew
Message: Which ones? I'm quite into House of Cards right now.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the second conversation. Andrew will start again and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: aaaa
Message: Well this person was like mad at me and I was mad at that person

Author: Andrew
Message: Why were they mad at you?

Author: aaaa
Message: Because I was mad at them

Author: Andrew
Message: Don't get mad at me, alright.

Author: Andrew
Message: I thought you were mad at me and you used caps.

Author: aaaa
Message: Well i suck at typing sometimes.

Author: aaaa
Message: I mean my friends say so..I hav n't watched

Author: Andrew
Message: What kind of shows do you watch?

Author: Andrew
Message: Is there any you're currently into?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm actually watching House of Cards.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise you can close this window.
